entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 16.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
